biotools.summary: It is developed to predict residue-residue contacts in alpha-helix transmembrane proteins. The predicted contacts could be further used to predict helix-helix interactions between helices.

bioschemas.name: TMhhcp
bioschemas.summary: It is developed to predict residue-residue contacts in alpha-helix transmembrane proteins. The predicted contacts could be further used to predict helix-helix interactions between helices.
